mapper.insert: insert into user_coupon (user_id,coupon_no,coupon_name,coupon_price,coupon_first,coupon_last,used) values ( #{user_id}, #{coupon_no}, (select coupon_name from admin_coupon where coupon_no=1), (select coupon_price from admin_coupon where coupon_no=1), now(), (select coupon_last from admin_coupon where coupon_no = 1), 0);
